snippet: The runoff election between Ms. Landrieu, the incumbent, and Bill Cassidy is set for Dec. 6.
abstract: Voters in Louisiana send Democratic Sen Mary Landrieu and her Republican challenger, Rep Bill Cassidy, into runoff election set for Dec 6; Landrieu is last Democrat representing a Deep South state in the United States Senate and the last Democrat in office in Louisiana to be elected statewide.
lead_paragraph: The runoff election between Ms. Landrieu, the incumbent, and Bill Cassidy is set for Dec. 6.

headline.main: Mary Landrieu of Louisiana Is Pushed to Runoff in Senate Race
headline.print_headline: Challenger Forces Race for Senate to a Runoff
